AdditionalInstanceConfiguration.description: Specify additional settings and launch scripts for your build instances.

properties.name: SystemsManagerAgent
properties.description: Contains settings for the SSM agent on your build instance.

type.description: Contains settings for the SSM agent on your build instance.

properties.name: UserDataOverride
properties.description: Use this property to provide commands or a command script to run when you launch your build instance.

type.description: Use this property to provide commands or a command script to run when you launch your build instance.

properties.name: ComponentArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: A group of parameter settings that are used to configure the component for a specific recipe.

type.description: A group of parameter settings that are used to configure the component for a specific recipe.

ComponentParameter.description: Contains a key/value pair that sets the named component parameter.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the component parameter to set.

type.description: The name of the component parameter to set.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Sets the value for the named component parameter.

type.description: Sets the value for the named component parameter.

EbsInstanceBlockDeviceSpecification.description: Amazon EBS-specific block device mapping specifications.

properties.name: DeleteOnTermination
properties.description: Use to configure delete on termination of the associated device.

type.description: Use to configure delete on termination of the associated device.

properties.name: Encrypted
properties.description: Use to configure device encryption.

type.description: Use to configure device encryption.

properties.name: Iops
properties.description: Use to configure device IOPS.

type.description: Use to configure device IOPS.

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: Use to configure the KMS key to use when encrypting the device.

type.description: Use to configure the KMS key to use when encrypting the device.

properties.name: SnapshotId
properties.description: The snapshot that defines the device contents.

type.description: The snapshot that defines the device contents.

properties.name: Throughput
properties.description: For GP3 volumes only - The throughput in MiB/s that the volume supports.

type.description: For GP3 volumes only - The throughput in MiB/s that the volume supports.

properties.name: VolumeSize
properties.description: Use to override the device's volume size.

type.description: Use to override the device's volume size.

properties.name: VolumeType
properties.description: Use to override the device's volume type.

type.description: Use to override the device's volume type.

InstanceBlockDeviceMapping.description: Defines block device mappings for the instance used to configure your image.

properties.name: DeviceName
properties.description: The device to which these mappings apply.

type.description: The device to which these mappings apply.

properties.name: Ebs
properties.description: Use to manage Amazon EBS-specific configuration for this mapping.

type.description: Use to manage Amazon EBS-specific configuration for this mapping.

properties.name: NoDevice
properties.description: Use to remove a mapping from the parent image.

type.description: Use to remove a mapping from the parent image.

properties.name: VirtualName
properties.description: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

type.description: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

SystemsManagerAgent.description: Contains settings for the SSM agent on your build instance.

properties.name: UninstallAfterBuild
properties.description: Controls whether the SSM agent is removed from your final build image, prior to creating the new AMI. If this is set to true, then the agent is removed from the final image. If it's set to false, then the agent is left in, so that it is included in the new AMI. The default value is false.

type.description: Controls whether the SSM agent is removed from your final build image, prior to creating the new AMI. If this is set to true, then the agent is removed from the final image. If it's set to false, then the agent is left in, so that it is included in the new AMI. The default value is false.

properties.name: AdditionalInstanceConfiguration
properties.description: Specify additional settings and launch scripts for your build instances.

type.description: Specify additional settings and launch scripts for your build instances.

properties.name: BlockDeviceMappings
properties.description: The block device mappings to apply when creating images from this recipe.

type.description: The block device mappings to apply when creating images from this recipe.

properties.name: Components
properties.description: The components of the image recipe.

type.description: The components of the image recipe.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the image recipe.

type.description: The description of the image recipe.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the image recipe.

type.description: The name of the image recipe.

properties.name: ParentImage
properties.description: The parent image of the image recipe.

type.description: The parent image of the image recipe.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags of the image recipe.

type.description: The tags of the image recipe.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The version of the image recipe.

type.description: The version of the image recipe.

properties.name: WorkingDirectory
properties.description: The working directory to be used during build and test workflows.

type.description: The working directory to be used during build and test workflows.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image recipe.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image recipe.
